Set.Payload: { "ciphertext": "%crypto_output#", "cipher": "%crypto_cipher#", "pbkdf2_iterations": "%crypto_pbkdf2_iterations#", "iv_hex": "%crypto_iv_hex#", "salt_hex": "%crypto_salt_hex#", "note": "you need the ciphertext, and a key and an IV to decrypt. Those are derived from the passphrase, with the salt and number of iterations" }
